vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2700
vote.title: Heller Amdt. No. 2700; To clarify that any private flood insurance policy accepted by a State shall satisfy the mandatory purchase requirement under the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2697
vote.title: Coburn Amdt. No. 2697; To allow States to opt-out of participation in the National Association of Registered Agents and Brokers.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2707
vote.title: Toomey Amdt. No. 2707 As Modified; To adjust phase-ins of flood insurance rate increases.

vote.question: On the Motion
vote.title: Motion to Waive All Applicable Budgetary Discipline Re: S. 1926; A bill to delay the implementation of certain provisions of the Biggert-Waters Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2012 and to reform the National Association of Registered Agents and Brokers, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S.1926; A bill to delay the implementation of certain provisions of the Biggert-Waters Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2012 and to reform the National Association of Registered Agents and Brokers, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Motion
vote.title: Motion to Concur in the House Amendment to the Senate Amendment to H.R. 3547; Making consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Concur in the House Amendment to Senate Amendment to H.R. 3547; Making consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Joint Resolution
vote.title: H.J.Res. 106; A joint resolution making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on S. 1845; A bill to provide for the extension of certain unemployment benefits, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion S.Amdt. 2631
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on Amdt. No. 2631 to S. 1845; Relating to extension and modification of emergency unemployment compensation program.

vote.question: On the Motion to Table
vote.title: Motion to Table the Motion to Commit S. 1845 to the Committee on Finance with Instructions; A bill to provide for the extension of certain unemployment benefits, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation Robert Leon Wilkins, of D.C., to be U.S. Circuit Judge for the D.C. Circuit

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Upon Reconsideration Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Nomination of Robert Wilkins to be U.S. Circuit Judge for the D.C. Circuit

vote.question: On the Motion to Reconsider
vote.title: Motion to Reconsider the Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Nomination of Robert Wilkins, to be U.S. Circuit Judge

vote.question: On the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Proceed to the Motion to Reconsider the Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Nomination of Robert Wilkins, to be U.S. Circuit Judge

vote.question: On the Motion to Table
vote.title: Motion to Table the Motion to Commit S.1845 to the Committee on Finance; A bill to provide for the extension of certain unemployment benefits, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to S. 1845; A bill to provide for the extension of certain unemployment benefits, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Nomination
vote.title: Confirmation Janet L. Yellen, to be Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System
